title: BMCR20
description: Actual temperature is higher than set high band limit.(High Band limit = Set temperature + High band)
reasons_remedies: The temperature of the perforation heater is high (15 0C less than the set temperature).
Check the temperature which is set for the perforation heater.
Check the band value set for the perforation heater.
Check the temperature sensor of the perforation heater.
Check functioning of Solid State Relay (S.S. R).
heck with multimeter if SSR is giving output in off State. Replace SSR if output is avaliable in off state.
Check if thermocouple is connected properly.
Check if the deafult PID parameters are shown on machine as per below image.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMCR20
Error Code 20
Category: BMCR
Title: BMCR20
Alarm Message: Perforation High Temperature
Description: Actual temperature is higher than set high band limit.(High Band limit = Set temperature + High band)
Reason & Remedy:
1. The temperature of the perforation heater is high (15 0C less than the set temperature).
2. Check the temperature which is set for the perforation heater.
3. Check the band value set for the perforation heater.
4. Check the temperature sensor of the perforation heater.
5. The heater is on continuously.
6. Check functioning of Solid State Relay (S.S. R).
7. heck with multimeter if SSR is giving output in off State. Replace SSR if output is avaliable in off state.
8. Check if thermocouple is connected properly.
9. PID parameters.
10. Check if the deafult PID parameters are shown on machine as per below image.
Visual References:
- Perforation Screen
